topic.title: Report a Problem and Share Feedback

body.p: We want to know when you experience any issues while using the MiTeam Meetings application. We also encourage you to share your ideas and suggestions about the application features. Use the following procedure to report a problem or to share feedback.

ol.li:
Access the Report Problem panel by doing the following.
During an ongoing meeting, click from the control panel. From the panel that opens, click the Others tab, and then click Report Problem. The Report Problem panel opens.
From the MiTeam Meetings home screen, click your avatar and from the panel that opens click Issues & Feedback. The Report Problem panel opens.

li.p: To submit an issue about the application, in the Submit an issue section, enter a title for the issue and provide a brief description of the issue. Click Add Screenshot if you want to attach a screenshot that clarifies the issue. Click Send. For more information on what happens to your problem report after it is submitted, see the FAQ What happens to my problem report.

To submit a new feature idea or feedback, click Share an idea. You will be redirected to a Mitel CloudLink Feedback pagein UserVoice, a third-party website where you can submit your ideas. Here, you can also vote on the ideas submitted by other users.
